post_title: WTB: Cobb Red with great centering
post_content:
Hi All,

Looking to buy a Cobb Red with great centering, PSA grade between 3-5. Don't really care about the back label, just ideally perfect centering and bright colors.
thank you!

[url=https://ibb.co/gJWgnbQ][img]https://i.ibb.co/7Kpy9xB/2458903.png[/img][/url]

There are copies with better centering out there and it's a slightly harder to find Old Mill Back, but I'll put this out there for consideration.

$5300
